title: Region en-us (BTS)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user logged in to the app
AND user's device region is set to US

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN navigates to Games tab - Beat the Streak
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see presented by BETMGM sponsor logo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigated to BTS Leaderboard  - the prizing header
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see presented by BETMGM sponsor logo

title: Region en-us (QP)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user logged in to the app
AND user's device region is set to US

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN navigates to Games tab - Quick Pick
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see presented by BETMGM sponsor logo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigated to QP Leaderboard  - the prizing header
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see presented by BETMGM sponsor logo

title: Region en-us (DD)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user logged in to the app
AND user's device region is set to US

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN navigates to Games tab - Diamond Derby
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see presented by MLB 9 innings 22 sponsor logo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigated to DD Leaderboard  - the prizing header
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see presented by MLB 9 innings 22 sponsor logo

title: Region CANADA
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user should set their region to Canada
AND User log in with valid account


THEN user should display with BET MGM sponsor logo on Leaderboard -> Prizing header

(POWERED BY BET MGM)
custom_steps:
WHEN user set their region to Canada
AND navigate to Game cards -> Leaderboard (Observe the prizing header)
custom_expected:
THEN user should not display with BET MGM sponsor logo on Leaderboard -> Prizing header

(POWERED BY BET MGM)

title: Region Quebec/CANADA (QP)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user should set their region to Quebec/Canada
AND User log in with valid account


THEN user should display with BET MGM sponsor logo on Leaderboard -> Prizing header

(POWERED BY BET MGM)
custom_steps:
WHEN user set their region to Quebec/Canada
AND navigate to Game cards -> Leaderboard (Observe the prizing header)
custom_expected: THEN user should not display with OLG sponsor logo on Leaderboard -> Prizing header

title: Region PR
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user should set their region to PR(Puerto Rico) 
AND User log in with valid account
custom_steps:
WHEN user set their region to PR
AND navigate to Game cards -> Leaderboard (Observe the prizing header)
custom_expected:
THEN user should not display with BET MGM sponsor logo on Leaderboard -> Prizing header

(POWERED BY BET MGM)

title: Region Others
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user logged in to the app
AND user's device region is set to any regions besides US, Canada, PR
custom_steps:
WHEN user set their region to UK or Australia  for example
AND navigate to Game cards -> Leaderboard (Observe the prizing header)
custom_expected:
THEN user should not display with BET MGM sponsor logo on Leaderboard -> Prizing header

(POWERED BY BET MGM)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to the games tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all game cards do not have any sponsor logo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigated to BTS leasderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THE user should not see any sponsor logo in the prizing header

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigated to QP leasderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THE user should not see any sponsor logo in the prizing header

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigated to DD leasderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THE user should not see any sponsor logo in the prizing header

title: SEO Title and description
custom_preconds: GIVEN user navigates to any search engine
custom_expected:
THEN user is displayed with:

* SEO Title “MLB Play | Beat the Streak, Diamond Derby, Quick Pick”
* SEO description “MLB Play lets you enjoy free-to-play games like Beat the Streak, Diamond Derby, and Quick Pick, with new games and features introduced year round.”

title: Clicking on your own MLB Play invite link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on a browser
AND user is logged in
AND sent a friend invite
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on their own MLB Play invite link
custom_expected:
THEN modal is displayed

Title: 'Couldn't Connect Friend'
Copy: 'Looks like you clicked on your own friend invite link. You can’t add yourself as a friend.'

title: Celebration modal behavior
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user logged in to the app
AND user is on any page of the app
AND user received the celebration modal

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the modal
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN nothing should happen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on X icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN modal should close

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks outside of the modal
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN modal should close

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user received multiple modals
AND user clicks on X button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the current modal should close and next available should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user received multiple modals
AND user clicks outside of the modal
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the current modal should close and next available should be displayed

title: Trophy Redemption Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user logged in to the app
AND user is on any page of the app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user earns a trophy
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a dismissible modal should be shown

design https://www.figma.com/file/wRJwHRmrDIdN3rrWuNLRxJ/MLB-Play-Platform?node-id=3287%3A34560

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views a modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with
* title 'You Earned a Trophy!'
* trophy image
* trophy name
* trophy short description


AND modal has a border radius
AND the modal should be presented with this animation

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on exit button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought back to the page user was previously on

title: Virtual Reward Pack Redemption Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user logged in to the app
AND user is on any page of the app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user earns a virtual reward pack
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a dismissible modal should be shown

design https://www.figma.com/file/wRJwHRmrDIdN3rrWuNLRxJ/MLB-Play-Platform?node-id=3287%3A34560

AND Virtual Reward Pack modal has Category | Rarity component
AND Virtual Reward Pack modal has scroll arrows

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user earns a modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN modal should have a carousel of virtual rewards earned in the pack
AND user is be able to swipe or tap to move left or right in the carousel to bring a different asset into focus (front/middle) space.
AND modal has a border radius
AND the modal should be presented with this animation

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the asset in focus
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN asset should be accompanied with the asset name and description
AND “Set as Your [asset class]” button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on “Set as Your [asset class]”
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to set a new avatar or wallpaper

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user already has the asset as default
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the button should change to gray and the copy should read “Currently Active [asset class]”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user sets it as default while in the modal
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the button should change to gray and the copy should read “Currently Active [asset class]”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the asset in focus changes
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the (old) name and description should fade out and be replaced with the (new) name and description that fades in.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on exit button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought back to the page user was previously on

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought back to the page user was previously on

title: Multiple Celebration Modal Display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user logged in to the app
AND user is on any page of the app
custom_steps: WHEN users are in the middle of doing celebration modal and a new one comes in
custom_expected:
THEN the recalculation the [x] of [y] should not happen
AND new celebration modals are displayed in the new set following after first set of modals is closed

title: EC - Multiple Celebration Modal Display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user logged in to the app
AND user is on any page of the app
custom_steps: WHEN user receives several celebration modals
custom_expected:
THEN there should be an “[x] of [y]” text string at the bottom of each modal in the multiple celebration modal display where [x] is the numeric position of the individual modal (from left to right) and [y] is the total number of modals in that sequence.

https://www.figma.com/proto/wRJwHRmrDIdN3rrWuNLRxJ/MLB-Play?page-id=21%3A2464&node-id=3418%3A48440&viewport=-1468%2C407%2C0.25&scaling=min-zoom&starting-point-node-id=3418%3A48411
